comment: The value of the finite geometric series ` 1 + A ^ 1 + A ^ 2 + ` ... ` + A ^ ( N - 1 ) ` . This is Metamath 100 proof #66. (Contributed by NM, 12-May-2006.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2014.)
